## Description
A clear description of the bug.

## Steps to reproduce
1. Go to '...'
2. Do '...'
3. See error

## Expected behavior
What you expected to happen.

## Actual behavior
What actually happened.

## Environment
- Node version: (e.g. 20.x)
- OS: (e.g. macOS, Windows, Linux)
- Browser (if UI): (e.g. Chrome 120)

## Error messages or logs
Paste any relevant errors or logs (redact API keys and secrets).

Any other context, screenshots, or configuration that might help.
